tool_description: Detects patterns and trends in fulfillment performance over time, identifying seasonal variations, emerging issues, and improvement opportunities through time-series analysis.
error_messages: Invalid analysis period: Use one of [3_months, 6_months, 1_year, 2_years]
Invalid pattern types: Use combinations of [seasonal, cyclical, trending, anomalous, recurring]
Insufficient historical data: Analysis period requires more historical data than available
usage: Specify analysis_period and pattern_types to detect. The tool analyzes historical fulfillment data to identify significant patterns and trends.

detected_patterns.description: List of detected patterns with descriptions

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: improving, declining, stable, volatile

seasonal_insights.description: Insights about seasonal patterns in fulfillment
